short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: removes 'play on TV' button on YouTube
short.ru: Убирает из ютуб плеера кнопку для просмотра на телевизоре

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
'play on TV' button is annoying element of YouTube and also is kind of dangerous. You no longer need to worry about accidentally pressing that button because it doesn't exist anymore after installing this extension.

==============

0.1.4 update to support manifest v3
long.ru: 'play on TV' button is annoying element of YouTube and also is kind of dangerous. You no longer need to worry about accidentally pressing that button because it doesn't exist anymore after installing this extension. If you for some reason need that button you can return it by simply clicking on the extension icon and them reload page.
